Business Intelligence (BI)
• Purpose: Transform data into actionable insights for decision-making • Capabilities: Reporting, dashboards, data visualization, trend analysis • Data Sources: Data warehouse, operational systems, external data • Tools: Tableau, Power BI, QlikView, custom reporting solutions • Users: Executives, managers, analysts, clinical quality teams • Content: Financial reports, operational metrics, quality indicators, regulatory reports • Benefits: Data-driven decisions, performance monitoring, strategic planning
